name: An adamantite necklace with a cross
data: It increases the users strength somewhat.
It decreases the users dexterity a tiny bit.
It increases the users constitution a bit.
It increases the users wisdom adequately.
It increases the users hitpoints poorly.
It has awesome armour class for its type (little in general).
It increases the users spellpoint regeneration superbly.
It increases the users hitpoint regeneration poorly.
It increases the users physical resistance strongly.
This item loses its magical powers very slowly.
The wearer becomes more attuned to the elemental forces.
